author: Reda√ß√£o Bonde com PCPR
title: Homem √© preso por tr√°fico de drogas e posse ilegal de muni√ß√£o em Londrina
text:
A PCPR (Pol√≠cia Civil do Paran√°) prendeu em flagrante, na manh√£ desta quarta-feira (9) em Londrina, um homem pela pr√°tica dos crimes de tr√°fico de drogas e posse ilegal de muni√ß√£o de uso restrito.
Conforme o delegado da PCPR Bruno Trento, a pris√£o ocorreu durante o cumprimento de mandados de busca e apreens√£o relacionados a uma investiga√ß√£o sobre disparo de arma de fogo ocorrido no dia 26 de janeiro deste ano.
O suspeito tamb√©m era alvo de diversas den√∫ncias an√¥nimas indicando envolvimento com a comercializa√ß√£o de entorpecentes em um ponto de tr√°fico localizado no bairro Jardim Franciscato.
‚ÄúDurante as buscas realizadas na resid√™ncia do indiv√≠duo, os policiais localizaram aproximadamente 470 gramas de subst√¢ncia an√°loga √† maconha, 100 gramas de subst√¢ncia an√°loga ao haxixe, uma balan√ßa de precis√£o, sacos do tipo ziplock e uma muni√ß√£o de calibre 9mm‚Äù, explica.
Diante dos materiais apreendidos, o homem foi autuado em flagrante e encaminhado ao sistema penitenci√°rio.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->drug related crimes

author: Mukut Das
title: Rain: Cyclonic Circulation Over J‚Äôkhand To Cause Widespread Rain In Ne | Guwahati News
text: Guwahati: Rain may play spoilsport during Holi, which will be celebrated here on Monday, as the IMD has forecast widespread rain over the northeast region till Tuesday.The Met department in a press communiqu√© stated that a cyclonic circulation over north Jharkhand and a trough running from this circulation to Manipur in lower tropospheric levels were marked.Sanjay O‚ÄôNeil Shaw, deputy DG of meteorology of Regional Meteorological Centre, Guwahati, said fairly widespread or widespread light to moderate rainfall with isolated thunderstorms and lightning is very likely over Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram and Tripura till Tuesday.He also said isolated heavy rainfall or snowfall is also likely over Arunachal Pradesh on Friday, Saturday and Monday and isolated heavy rainfall over Assam and Meghalaya on Friday, Saturday and Monday.Light to moderate rainfall lashed several places in Assam, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram and Tripura in the last 24 hours.According to the IMD data, Assam received 4.3 mm rain, which is 1.3mm more than normal, in the last 24 hours while its neighbor Meghalaya received 5.7mm (2.9 mm more than normal), Arunachal Pradesh received 6.5 mm (1.5 mm more than normal) and Manipur received 4.3 mm (1.4 mm more than normal). author: @citi973
title: I'll prioritise welfare of cocoa farmers - Akufo-Addo assures
text:
President Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo has reaffirmed his commitment to developing a resilient cocoa industry that prioritises the welfare of cocoa farmers.
He made the comments during the official opening of the permanent office of the Cote d‚ÄôIvoire-Ghana Cocoa Initiative in Accra.
Underlining his government‚Äôs accomplishments President Akufo-Addo stressed that his administration has instituted the highest cocoa producer price in the nation‚Äôs history.
‚ÄúIn 2019, Ghana and Cote d‚ÄôIvoire met in Accra where we held a dialogue on an important subject, which was critical to the survival of the global cocoa industry supply chain. That meeting, culminated in the adoption of a living income deferential for cocoa producers in the two countries which involves the additional payment of cocoa farmers of $400 per ton on the world market price for every cocoa sold by the two nations effective by the 2020/2021 season.
‚ÄúThe international cocoa market justifies our course of action. What we thought was impossible only two years ago is happening now,‚Äù he stated.
However, President Akufo-Addo also stressed the critical need for collaborative efforts between Ghana and Cote d‚ÄôIvoire to address the myriad of challenges confronting the cocoa industry.
‚ÄúHowever, with the current peak in market prices, a new set of challenges has emerged necessitating a revision of the research approach to sustain or prevent a decline in prices. This underscores the importance of this organisation for the two countries to devise new strategies to address the evolving market dynamics,‚Äù he stated.

author: Ryan Droste
title: Nick Khan Reveals WWE Will Return To France For PLE In 2025
text:
Nick Khan Reveals WWE Will Return To France For PLE In 2025
WWE President Nick Khan held an event in Las Vegas, Nevada on Thursday (January 16), and he ended up revealing some information that was not yet publicly known.
Khan told the press that WWE will bring a PLE to Paris, France at some point in 2025, as first reported by Bill Pritchard of WrestleZone. It was not revealed which WWE yearly event will take place in the city, just that one will happen there this year.
This news follows WWE's continual international growth when it comes to PLE locations. Just last year, WWE held Backlash at the LDLC Arena in Lyon, France.
Additionally, WWE held Elimination Chamber in Perth (Australia), King and Queen of the Ring in Jeddah (Saudi Arabia), Money In The Bank in Toronto (Canada), Clash at the Castle in Glasgow (Scotland), Bash In Berlin in Berlin (Germany), Crown Jewel in Riyadh (Saudi Arabia), and Survivor Series in Vancouver (Canada).
MORE: Triple H And Nick Khan Talk Potential Content Shifts As WWE Raw Moves To Netflix
The only 2025 PLE events that have officially been announced thus far are Royal Rumble (Indianapolis, IN), Elimination Chamber (Toronto, ON), WrestleMania (Las Vegas, NV), and SummerSlam (East Rutherford, NJ).
The Latest On WWE, AEW & More
New WWE Trademarks Reveal New John Cena Farewell Merchandise To Come
Bob Ueker, Star Of Major League And WWE Hall Of Famer, Passes Away At 90
RevPro Reveals Plans For Mercedes Mone's Title Defenses
Latest On Malakai Black's Rumored AEW Departure & Possible Return To WWE

title: Comentario en Reciben polic√≠as reconocimiento por cursos de Alta Especializaci√≥n por FiverrEarn
text:
Portada
Reciben polic√≠as reconocimiento por cursos de Alta Especializaci√≥n
En Quer√©taro la seguridad es un tema prioritario,
expres√≥ el secretario de la SSC Iov√°n El√≠as P√©rez
Noticias
El titular de la
Secretar√≠a de Seguridad Ciudadana, Iov√°n El√≠as P√©rez Hern√°ndez, encabez√≥ la ceremonia de clausura del segundo curso de Operaciones T√°cticas Urbanas, impartido por la Polic√≠a Nacional de Colombia a elementos de la Polic√≠a Queretana, con lo cual se sigue dando cumplimiento al Programa Estatal de
Seguridad.
Dentro de este segundo m√≥dulo se tuvo la participaci√≥n de 15 elementos de la Polic√≠a Estatal y del Sistema Penitenciario; los cuales se suman a los 35 oficiales que egresaron, en el primer grupo, el pasado mes de julio, donde tambi√©n se tuvo la participaci√≥n de corporaciones de seguridad p√∫blica municipal de Corregidora, El Marqu√©s y Polic√≠a de Investigaci√≥n del Delito.
El funcionario estatal, manifest√≥ que en Quer√©taro la seguridad es un tema prioritario,por lo que la sociedad puede tener la certeza de que todos los d√≠as se trabaja por la capacitaci√≥n y preparaci√≥n de los polic√≠as que los cuidan.
‚ÄúPara el se√±or gobernador, Mauricio Kuri, la seguridad es uno de los principales compromisos, por lo que, siguiendo su visi√≥n, nos estamos capacitando con una de las mejores corporaciones del mundo y es que para ser la mejor polic√≠a de M√©xico, tenemos que trabajar con los mejores‚Äù, se√±al√≥.
Las capacitaciones a los diferentes integrantes de la polic√≠a queretana continuar√°n durante los siguientes meses, toda vez que se llevar√°n a cabo dos m√≥dulos m√°s de Operaciones T√°cticas Urbanas y diferentes cursos para aportar al desarrollo profesional de los oficiales.
En el evento estuvo presente el asesor de Pol√≠ticas P√∫blicas del Poder Ejecutivo del Estado de
Quer√©taro, Juan Mart√≠n Granados Torres; el comisionado del Sistema Penitenciario, Gustavo L√≥pez Acosta y el director general del Colegio de Polic√≠as, Cecafis, Alberto Luna

author: RT en Espa√±ol
title: Voluntario ruso denuncia masacre de civiles por militares ucranianos en la provincia de Kursk - RT
text:
Voluntario ruso denuncia masacre de civiles por militares ucranianos en la provincia de Kursk Publicado: 23 ago 2024 02:09 GMT En las im√°genes captadas desde un dron se ven los cad√°veres de varios civiles asesinados por tropas ucranianas en los primeros d√≠as de la incursi√≥n.
Captura de pantalla Telegram / @diomeddog Un voluntario ruso, que actualmente se encuentra en la provincia de Kursk, ha publicado im√°genes que muestran las atrocidades cometidas por las tropas del r√©gimen de Kiev contra la poblaci√≥n civil.
En su cuenta de Telegram, Plat√≥n Mam√°tov difundi√≥ im√°genes que tom√≥ desde un dron en los primeros d√≠as de la incursi√≥n de las tropas ucranianas en la zona, en las que se ven los cad√°veres de varios civiles asesinados por los ucranianos en una carretera.
"El hombre de la bicicleta es claramente un civil. Tambi√©n 100% civil es el fallecido que lleva chanclas lilas", escribi√≥ el autor del video.
ADVERTENCIA: LAS SIGUIENTES IM√ÅGENES PUEDEN HERIR SU SENSIBILIDAD
Previamente, el presidente de Rusia, Vlad√≠mir Putin, acus√≥ a los ucranianos de "disparar indiscriminadamente contra civiles".
Putin: Ucrania trat√≥ de atacar la central nuclear de Kursk "El r√©gimen de Kiev ha emprendido otra provocaci√≥n a gran escala, disparando indiscriminadamente con diversos tipos de armas, incluidos cohetes, contra edificios civiles, viviendas residenciales y ambulancias ", declar√≥.
Posteriormente, refiri√©ndose a las posibles negociaciones de paz, el mandatario expres√≥ que ahora no hay nada de qu√© hablar con la parte del conflicto que ataca a civiles. "Aparentemente, el enemigo busca mejorar sus posiciones negociadoras en el futuro, pero, ¬øde qu√© tipo de negociaciones podemos hablar con gente que ataca indiscriminadamente a civiles, infraestructuras civiles o intenta amenazar instalaciones de energ√≠a nuclear? ¬øDe qu√© se puede hablar con ellos? ", agreg√≥.
Conflictos Rusia Ucrania comentarios You use your browser with disabled JavaScript. Please enable JavaScript for comments.

author: Ehorus
title: #45 Rabino sionista expone la mentalidad supremacista sionista autoproclam√°ndose como los "elegidos de dios" y admitiendo sentirse superior a los no-judios
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#3](c3#c-3) y est√° escrito, en su libro m√°gico, que todos los no jud√≠os existen para servir a los jud√≠os.
Su libro m√°gico es el bueno, los dem√°s libros m√°gicos no.
[#19](c19#c-19) En realidad s√≠, pero no te alarmes, no hay construcci√≥n de la identidad etnica de un grupo (y m√°s si se trata de uno generalmente minoritario y perseguido)n sin su dosis de etnocentrismo.
En el caso de los creyentes en yahv√© el resto de la humanidad es referida como ‚Äúgoyim‚Äù, o ‚Äúgentiles‚Äù y no tiene connotaciones especialmente positivas.
[#3](c3#c-3) T√≠pico de fanatismos y sectas cuando se hace una barrera entre los que est√°n dentro y los que est√°n fuera. Cuando la religi√≥n no respeta otras formas de ver el mundo es cuando empiezan los fanatismos y las hostias. Si no se acepta la diversidad de credos, apaga y v√°monos porque lo que viene luego no es agradable para nadie.
Luego empezar√°n con sus Frentes Populares de Judea y acabar√°n a hostia limpia entre ellos, porque alguien que necesita y busca enemigos para elevar su moral y sus creencias son un saco de hostias en potencia. Alguien que piense as√≠, tiene todas las papeletas para recibir hostias a cascoporro y es lo que van buscando. Quien anda con fuego acaba quem√°ndose.
[#5](c5#c-5) En realidad este discurso en concreto se parece m√°s al del ISIS que al de Hitler.
Aunque el resultado de ambos sea el mismo.
[#9](c9#c-9) Creo que el problema es que eso lo dice la religi√≥n de los jud√≠os, que son descendientes de no s√© qu√© tribu elegida por un dios.
Y habr√° jud√≠os que se tomen el judaismo como pertenencia a un grupo y lo reinterpretan y lo ponen al servicio de su vida (igual que hay cristianos que no apedrean a su hija si se casa sin el permiso de su padre). Pero el judaismo tiene una base de supremacismo muy mala de esquivar.
[#2](c2#c-2) Un mes.. da un mes, al resto del planeta - sin eeuu... iban a ver los "elegidos" que opinan de aquello del "pueblo elegido"...
Pues para ser el pueblo elegido:
- menuda mierda territorio les ha dado, a m√≠ que me den algo que no sea un puto desierto: Francia, El norte de Espa√±a, Italia, las Seychelles, las mismas orillas del Nilo, Mesopotamia. Zonas f√©rtiles.
- Salvo los √∫ltimos 70 a√±os les han dado m√°s que a una estera.
As√≠ que menudo dios cutre.
[#11](c11#c-11) Eso es: si su dios los hubiera elegido y les tuviera cari√±o bien pudo haberles dao cuerpo de senegal√©s...
[#11](c11#c-11) Un amigo ingeniero agr√≥nomo me cont√≥ que aquella zona en tiempos b√≠blicos fue un vergel, pero empezaron a regar los cultivos con agua de mar y se lo cargaron. No son muy listos los ‚Äúelegidos‚Äù.
Si Dios existiera har√≠a un fisting con su culo y les enviar√≠a al puto infierno por toda la eternidad.
[#23](c23#c-23) No s√© salvaron los que no quisieron realizar la Ali√° (que empez√≥ en 1840 https://es.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ali%C3%A1 ) y a esos que no se salvaron los llamaron los sacrificados o holocausto https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Holocausto_(sacrificio)
Es supremacista (pueblo elegido, el resto est√° para servir) y elitista (no buscan crear nuevos adeptos como en el cristianismo o islamismo o naces jud√≠o o no eres jud√≠o)
Esto lo dicen los lideres religiosos judios y la mayoria de ellos lo aceptan como algo natural y te lo repiten con otras palabras menos extremas pero que vienen a ser lo mismo
Pues al final hablando as√≠ hasta hacen buenos a los nazis, igual estaban enga√±ados con esta gente...

author: Sarah Rumpf-Whitten, Fox Business Published Jan. 10, 2025, 4:46 a.m. ET Originally Published by:
title: Judge halts attempt to retrieve Bitcoin hard drive worth nearly $750 million from landfill
text: James Howells launched a legal case after he lost his Bitcoin hard drive in a landfill in 2013.

author: world today us
title: " CNN Host Struck by Debris on Live Air While Reporting Hurricane Milton: A Dramatic Tale of Survival "
text:
CNN Host Struck by Flying Debris While Reporting on Hurricane Milton CNN‚Äôs on-ground reporter faced a terrifying incident while covering the chaos of Hurricane Milton, as debris flew into the camera‚Äôs shot during a live broadcast. This dramatic moment underscores the severe impact of the storm as it wreaked havoc across Florida.
Hurricane Milton Causes Devastating Damage in Florida With at least 17 confirmed deaths , Hurricane Milton has left a trail of destruction across the state of Florida. Experts warn that the risk of flooding persists, potentially lasting for ‚Äúdays to weeks.‚Äù Authorities are scrambling to assess the damage, particularly in the severely affected west-central region of the state.
As of early Saturday, approximately 1.8 million households remain without power, prompting over 50,000 utility workers to be deployed for restoration efforts, as confirmed by Governor Ron DeSantis.
Environmental Impact A phosphate mine operator faced backlash after releasing thousands of gallons of pollutants into Tampa Bay due to overflowing drains during the storm.
Hurricane Milton‚Äôs Powerful Path Hurricane Milton made landfall as a Category 3 storm on Wednesday night, particularly affecting Sarasota County‚Äôs Siesta Key. The hurricane‚Äôs force spurred numerous tornadoes, created 28-ft waves, and produced heavy rainfall and severe storm surges.
Tragedies struck in a retirement community in St. Lucie County, where six lives were claimed after tornadoes surged through the area in a mere 20 minutes.
Substantial winds caused a crane to topple onto The Tampa Bay Times building in St. Petersburg, while the Tampa Bay Rays reported significant damage to the roof of their Tropicana Field stadium.
Storm Outcome and Community Resilience As recovery and rescue operations continue, Florida‚Äôs communities are rallying together. Evacuations preceding the storm likely mitigated the potential death toll, with many recalling the devastation from Hurricane Helene just weeks prior, prompting widespread preparations for Milton.
Local Stories of Survival Florida residents, including Fred and Rita Neuman, reflected on their evacuation journey to the Panhandle. Living in Siesta Key, they chose safety after witnessing the terrifying power of Helene. ‚ÄúI love my house, but I‚Äôm not dying in it,‚Äù Fred stated as he faced the aftermath awaiting at home.
In nearby Palmetto, residents Lee and Pamela Essenburm took precautions as winds ravaged their backyard trees. ‚ÄúI wasn‚Äôt going to take a chance on it,‚Äù Lee expressed, showcasing the community‚Äôs proactive stance against such storms.
Florida Faces Ongoing Rescue Operations Rescue efforts are crucial as the full scope of Hurricane Milton‚Äôs impact becomes clearer. Authorities collaborate with local organizations on search and rescue missions for residents and their animals, including pets unexpectedly caught in the storm‚Äôs aftermath.
Enviromental Observations As the state assesses the storm‚Äôs environmental aftermath, reports state the hurricane‚Äôs increased rainfall by 20 to 30 percent is attributable to the climate crisis. This includes an approximate 10 percent rise in winds due to humanitarian-driven warming. Experts highlighted the urgency of hurricane preparedness as storm frequency and intensity continue to rise.
Aerial Views of the Destruction Contrasts in safety remind families across Florida of daunting realities. Aerial footage showcases ravaged neighborhoods due to tornadoes as Hurricane Milton passed. This visual evidence underscores the need for expanded emergency measures and community recovery efforts.
